txt.en: The statue of Helm has been destroyed
The statue of Helm has been destroyed
Do not allow Helm's statue to be destroyed

Helm Hammerhand's memorial stands upon the Dike at the location where he perished. The Rohirrim draw inspiration and courage from the sight of the statue raised above the trench wall. The enemy cannot be allowed to destroy the statue while the men of Rohan still stand to defend Helm's Dike. Trolls are charging toward the statue in an attempt to destroy it, while others are attacking the caches of weapons at the east watch-tower.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
* Statue is dealt structural damage
* Rohirrim weapon cache destroyed
* Rohirrim guarding the statue is defeated
Helm Hammerhand's statue must be defended from the enemies seeking to desecrate his memorial and dishearten the soldiers guarding the dike.
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow Helm's statue to be destroyed</rgb>
Defeat waves of enemies attacking Helm's Statue or weapon caches ([placeholder]/7)
A weapons cache has been destroyed
